fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Pop your balloon, dropping your defense to None

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-While you have your balloon, you will ignore all negative effects (ie roleblocks, poisons, etc.) that target you during the night, including attacks. They will still happen, you just are not affected by them.
-If you get hit by a Basic Attack, your balloon pops and you lose your first attribute & overprotective defense.
